deal.features: - A bundle of toys for your bundle of joys - You get 20 random color fidget spinners (10 LED and 10 metal) - You also get 2 random Duncan Groove kendamas - As well as 2 random Hot Wheels Star Wars Ships - In addition to 1 random flex car or bug - We’re saying random, but it’s likely a lot of duplicates, like you might get two x-wings - Not to mention 0 pepper sprays (see writeup) - Listen, this is pretty cheap for a bunch of toys - Model: HappyHappyToyToy
deal.title: Hey It's Some Toys
deal.specifications: Specs ==== - **Flex Car/Bug** - Model: DK-FLEX-BUG or DK-FLEX-CAR - Condition: New - 62 pieces in a set - Soft and flexible pieces - Age 5 and up - **Star Wars Ships** - Model: Boba Fett's Slave, Darth Vader's Tie Advanced X1 Prototype, First Order Tie Fighter, Millenium Falcon, Partisan X-Wing Fighter, Poe's X-Wing Fighter, Rebel U- Wing Fighter, The Ghost - Condition: New - **Kendama** - Model: 3860KE - Condition: New - Made of wood and string - Part Kendama, part yoyo - **Fidget Spinners** - Model: Spinners - Condition: New - They spin - [They don't stop](http://weridinspinners.ytmnd.com/) What's in the Box? ==== 1x Random Car or Bug set (62 pieces) 2x Hot Wheels Star Wars Ships 2x Duncan Kendama 10x Metal Fidget Spinners 10x LED Fidget Spinners 0x Pepper Spray Pictures ==== [Stuff](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1516423150/c03w4qs58sw5cdisqmfe.png	) [Spinners](http://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1516394744/rzvciaqchlzjxij6rv8l.png) [Kendamas](https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1516421191/iaxc3fzim2il5dnacizp.png) [Star Wars Ships]( https://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1516422684/bq3gxqhjirstwvv4dij5.png) [Discovery Cars](http://res.cloudinary.com/mediocre/image/upload/v1516394743/gfn2iress4biewakfz51.png) [Potoooooooo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Potoooooooo) Price Comparison ==== [$20 (for 2) at Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00UZH23MG/?tag=meh0ec-20) [$9 (for 2) at Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01CVC9LO0/?=meh0ec-20) [$9.95 at Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B075ZJWPZP/?tag=meh0ec-20) [$119.80 (for 20) at Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B071Y882TS/?tag=meh0ec-20)

story.title: Step x Step
story.body: [Editor’s note: This bundle was originally planned to include pepper spray as a “humorously” inappropriate toy. However, our lawyers and common sense suggested we remove the pepper spray from the bundle. The following product description was written before this change, and has been edited to reflect it. We apologize. The person responsible for the pepper spray idea has been pepper sprayed.] **Have you heard of the new** ~~thing the~~ **kids** ~~are doing? It’s called “Peppering.” You take a can of pepper spray and shoot it~~ **on** ~~your face as long as you can. Lawmakers have recently learned of~~ **the** ~~phenomenon and are taking steps to have pepper spray~~ **block**~~ed for sale to minors.~~ ~~What are~~ **they** ~~thinking, these kids? Why~~ **were a** ~~bunch of~~ **boy**~~s in Wyoming recently caught spraying themselves in the face before~~ **band** ~~practice? The fact~~ **that** ~~they~~ **enjoyed** ~~it has been~~ **success**~~fully demonstrated~~ **in** ~~interviews with~~ **the** ~~boys. It’s too~~ **early** ~~to say how widespread “peppering” is, but parents haven’t been this upset since the violent video game scare of the~~ **1990s**. ~~Some parents report that~~ **their** ~~children take~~ “**hits**” ~~of pepper spray to the face until one of them gives up. Others play a more elaborate game that~~ **include**~~s many parts.~~ **Step** ~~1: Spray yourself in the face with pepper spray~~ **by** ~~yourself.~~ **Step** ~~2: Spray yourself in the face with pepper spray while others watch and cheer.~~ **And** ~~although most kids enjoy “peppering” while~~ **hanging** ~~out with friends, others are reported to have made it a solo endeavor. Officials say it has been~~ **tough** ~~to collect data on this latter trend.~~ **They** ~~also aren’t~~ **sure** ~~about the geographical distributing of “Peppering.” The first reports of the behavior~~ **were** ~~reported on the West Coast but it has been~~ **pretty** ~~difficult to triangulate back to the specific source.~~ **We** ~~aren’t suggesting you buy these bundles of toys and give the pepper spray to your children. If you keep that for yourself your children won’t~~ **miss them**~~. Then you can try “peppering” yourself and see if you like it~~ **very much**.

answers.text: How can I pick just one?
I was way too old for that
I was way too cool for that
I don't even know what that is
I'll provide irrefutable, step-by-step proof of my choice in the comments
